GRA7 clusters to be migrated next week.

we updated this task schedule.

End time : 06/07/2023 17:00 UTC

entry.title: [GLOBAL][ManagedKubernetesService] Managed nodes OS upgrades for clusters in "Do not update" and "Minimum unavailability" policy update configuration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 13, 08:30 UTC  -  Jun 15, 16:00 UTC

Apr 13, 12:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/06/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 15/06/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected but you should have enough nodes in your K8S cluster to allow a rolling upgrade of them and to absorb a rescheduling of your workload without downtime.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will upgrade all public cloud instances (a.k.a. nodes) managed by the MKS team and running in your Kubernetes clusters to upgrade them from the operating system Ubuntu 18.04.06 LTS version to the Ubuntu 22.04.02 LTS version.
Clusters with an upgrade policy set to "Do not update / NEVER_UPDATE" and "Minimum unavailability / MINIMAL_DOWNTIME" are targeted by this maintenance.
To prevent non wanted upgrade on MKS services, we leave it up to the customers more time to manage this upgrade by themselves.
But, as the Ubuntu 18.04 LTS support will be disabled on the 31/05/2023, be aware that in case of critical vulnerability, we kept the right to force upgrade impacted services to patch as soon as possible vulnerable managed control planes and nodes.

entry.title: [GRA5/BHS5][Public Cloud] Control plane unreachable
entry.content:
Jun 8, 16:16 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 08/06/2023 12:45 UTC
End Time : 08/06/2023 15:45 UTC
Root cause : We encountered a problem with our automatic node rebuilding process, which resulted in improperly configured nodes joining the cluster. As a consequence, these nodes experienced network issues, leading to instability in the control plane network.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 8, 15:29 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 8, 13:07 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 08/06/2023 08/06/2023 12:45 UTC
Service impact : Control plane unreachable
Root cause : Still investigating
Update will be made as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [UK][Storage] - Object storage
entry.content:
Jun 7, 07:57 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/06/2023 06H00 UTC
End time : 07/06/2023 06H45 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a change

Jun 7, 07:01 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 7, 06:38 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 7, 06:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2023 06H00 UTC
Service impact : Object storage is unreachable for customers in Uk region
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.
